name: Aviant
description:
Welclome to the Aviant demo! This project was in development over the summer of 2022 by Matthew Bouch, Owen Elliott, Sophia Ku, and Sam Trudeau. Fight back against the Dark Druid, who is sending monsters to attack your home city of Ornithis!

Music by Owen Elliott and Hannah. Controller and mouse + keyboard are supported!

Please enjoy our game!
